forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Thunder is possible early. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Thunder is possible early. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low -3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 27F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: On and off snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.
